Although I am not a dev myself, I don't think they plan to add that feature, unfortunately (I want it myself too).

Despite the interacting-like interiors, they never mentioned anything about adding it. ![:(](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_sad.gif)
I doubt it. IVAs in KSP exist only to provide a backdrop for the Kerbal faces in the lower right and to provide you with a radar altimeter. Other than that they're pretty much completely useless.

I always thought something like that was coming, but haven't heard anything on it in forever. I always figured with the name IVA (Intra-Vehicular Activity) there would be some, you know, activities to do.

I'd kinda like a whole update devoted to life in space. Life support, inflatable habitat modules, etc.

they could do some things, but I wouldnt expect a full movement ability. imagine a craft like this:![2XcZJe3.jpg](http://i.imgur.com/2XcZJe3.jpg)
